description: Two teams try to book the same meeting room. Each must decide whether to wait for the room to be free or go to another room. If both wait, there's a scheduling conflict. If both go, they find no rooms available. If one waits while the other goes, they get a room.

participants.name: You
participants.profile: Team leader of the product development team

participants.name: Bob
participants.profile: Team leader of the design team

behavior_choices.wait: Wait for the room to be free
